title: Interpretation of seeing and wearing torn clothes in a dream

preview.html: Below we will give you a detailed interpretation of seeing torn clothes in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Torn ClothesIbn Sirin says that torn or dirty clothes in a dream may indicate evil calamities that will affect the opinion. Torn or dirty clothes or scattered everywhere may indicate that the owner of insight He may have suffered serious hardship, illness, or death, in contrast to new or elegant clothes at work or in the family. Seeing old clothes in a dream: Whoever sees that he is buying old clothes and they are fine, this indicates kindness. An opinion can return to the person from whom it has been estranged for years and also lead to reconciliation between those who disagree. Whoever wants in his dream to know who is wearing old torn clothes, this indicates that the one who wears torn clothes will be exposed to a serious illness or die. As for whoever sees in a dream a lot of people wearing torn clothes, this indicates that he will cause major problems among his family, which may It leads to the boycott of some of them’s parents. Seeing a dead man’s clothes in a dream Whoever sees a dead man in his dream wearing clean, new clothes, this indicates good news for the dreamer and that he will receive happy events. But if the dreamer sees the deceased wearing old and torn clothes, this indicates that evil will happen to the dreamer. Vision Torn clothes for single womenIf an unmarried girl sees herself wearing an old and torn dress, this is a sign that she will associate it with some indicator and will suffer greatly with it. But if a girl sees herself wearing a beautiful, new dress, this is evidence that she will marry a good man who will make her happy. Seeing a pregnant woman in clothesIf a woman sees A pregnant woman in her dream is that she is buying clothes for a male child, this means that God will give her a female child, but if she sees that she is buying clothes for a female child, this means that she will give birth to a boy. If the pregnant woman sees that she is wearing torn clothes, this may indicate the difficulty of giving birth, but if she sees that she is buying old clothes And a torn baby boy, this means that she will give birth to a sick baby. Health problems. Whoever has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article on the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of seeing a check in a dream and its meaning for women and men

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a check in a dream: Many transactions can be carried out between a person, companies or stores, as an individual can pay with a check instead of cash, as checks can be dealt with by businessmen and owners of large projects, and everyone cannot use them unless they have a sufficient balance of money in The bank, and its use, have many laws. Interpretation of seeing a check in a dream: Checks may be one of the tools used to pay a large sum of money in exchange for a service or transaction, and the interpretation of seeing a check in the sky has many elements and interpretations, such as: Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a check on an unmarried girl can It is considered a sign of the girl’s marriage in the near future. While the single girl received a check, it showed that she married a well-off person. It is one of the indicators of successes that the viewer will achieve in his life. It can also be considered as an approaching graduation for someone studying at the university. Since the check in the dream is Also a travel sign for the fortuneteller. Commentators also interpreted the point of view of checks, in general, as one of the indicators of goodness that the fortuneteller will receive. Also, checking the presence of an unmarried human being for happiness in a near marriage with her. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see a ring in A dream for a single woman and a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving a check. One of the currencies that can be exchanged between many companies, merchants and businessmen is the use of checks. To interpret a dream about a dead person a check gives many different indications and interpretations, such as: From one of the signs of abundant feeding to God. While, in If the dead man was handed over to you, it was tangled and uncertified, which indicates a bad end for the priest. Commentators explained that seeing a check from among the dead has many evidence according to the details of the fortuneteller’s dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its effects. Seeing a check book in a dream for single people can Using checks to secure the rights of individuals and companies that may be processed as there are many companies that deal only in checks. Seeing a checkbook in a dream for a single woman is evidence: - It can be considered evidence that her marriage contract will be signed soon. Also, the stamp at the end of the check confirms its arrival. To the engagement stage. Also, the date specified on the check for a single woman may indicate that an event will happen to her on that date. As the check is a sign of the success of a single girl, whether in travel, work or study. See also: Interpretation of a dream about getting engaged in a dream and its meaning according to the most famous interpreters Immediate Seeing the post office in a dream for an unmarried woman: There are many companies that individuals and companies can use to provide many different services or products, and seeing the post office in a dream for an unmarried woman has many clues and interpretations: The girl can be considered that she will travel to find work. As evidence of life. The unmarried girl changes hands, even though the check contains a large amount of money for Azza

title: Interpretation of long hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin - seeing hair in a dream

preview.html: Seeing long hair in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether it is smooth in a dream, long hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams of long hair in a dream and is satisfied with it is worthy of praise, especially among women. Because they use other people’s hair for adornment, and seeing long hair is worthy of praise, and its trade is based on the saying: God Almighty (and He has multiplied him in knowledge and body), and if the dreamer is a woman, her vision indicates childbirth, and it is said that he is an orphan. Long hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing long hair in a dream appears Many different signs, such as if a person sees in his dream that his hair is long, black, and soft, this indicates that that person will enjoy a lot of goodness and money, but if a person sees that his hair is long and curly, this means that this person is suffering from many problems in his life and that he is suffering. Of confusion. Seeing long hair in a dream. If a woman dreams that her hair is very long and soft, this means that she enjoys a luxurious life free of problems and difficulties. If her hair is long, curly, and coarse, this indicates that she is suffering from many problems in her life. But if a man sees In a dream that his hair is very long, like the hair of a horse, this means that this person is suffering from problems and his secret will be revealed and he will face a very difficult time in front of people. If this person is sick, this indicates the death of that person. Interpretation of long hair in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Some have said that Head hair in a dream indicates money and permanence, and therefore whoever dreams that the hair on his head is long will have a long life, and among the women who see that the hair on her head is long. The dream is a good and desirable thing for a woman. The longer the hair of the person concerned in the dream, the greater the anxiety. The longer the hair of the happy person, the greater the happiness. Whoever shortens the length of his hair in a dream is anxious. And his distress is his debts. As for braiding hair, they are debts owed by everyone. As for whoever sees in his dream that he put his hair up and braided his hair, then he saves his money and manages his affairs, and whoever has his hair back. In a place where hair does not grow, he will suffer from worry and anxiety. And whoever sees himself cutting his hair and shaving it in a dream at the time of Hajj: in safety and without fear. As for the thief who saw in his dream that his hair became like a horse’s hair, he will be arrested, and whoever saw that his hair became like a horse’s hair. Pig hair will face problems and difficulties. Whoever sees that her hair has turned black in a dream, this indicates her husband’s love for her, and good hair indicates good deeds, and whoever braids and braids for her, her time has come and her husband will miss her. And anyone who has his hair in a dream will recognize some of his faults. Interpretation of cutting long hair in a dream. If a man or girl sees in a dream that he is cutting long hair in a dream without feeling sad about it, this means that this person will get rid of worries and problems in his life. Interpretation of long hair in a dream OneDream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her hair is long and soft, this means that she trusts her and that she will maintain it well and it will be fulfilled.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying one’s father

preview.html: And seeing the father marrying a young man in a dream is a sign of the calamities that he will enter, and through our translator’s site we will talk about the father’s marriage in detail, follow us. Interpretation of seeing the father marrying in a dream for a single girl Also, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is preparing to marry her father in a dream and she is happy. It shows the great closeness that she lives with her father in life and that she has not separated from him. While she was seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, she was marrying her father in a dream while she was nervous. It indicates that he will live in a lot of goodness, abundance and proximity, God willing. And if the unmarried woman refuses to marry her fiancé and accepts to marry the father in a dream. This is an indication that she is constantly looking for her interest in life, and trying to see the good. As for seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, she is looking forward to marrying her father in a dream. Explaining that she will face a lot of good foods and abundance in her life, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the father’s wedding in a dream for a married woman If a married woman dreams that she is marrying her father, she is very happy. It indicates that she will get rid of the bad things that She lives with her husband, God willing. And the vision of a married woman sees her father's marriage in a dream and rejects it. It indicates that she will live in great despair in her life and poverty in the coming period. And the married woman is preparing in a dream to marry the father in a dream and she is happy. This is an indication that she will experience delicious food in her life, and an abundance of goodness, God willing. And a married woman in a dream is looking for a father to marry him in a dream. It indicates that she is in dire need of her father and his advice in the affairs of her life. Interpretation of seeing the father's wedding in a dream for a divorced woman If the divorced woman sees in a dream that she married the father in a dream and was happy. This is an indication that she will marry soon, God willing, a righteous man. And if the divorced woman is looking for the father in a dream, in order to marry him in a dream. This is an indication that she is looking for goodness and food in her life and will find it, God willing. Likewise, a divorced woman sees in a dream that she was refusing to marry her father in a dream. It indicates that she will suffer a lot in the coming period of her life and will witness despair. As for the divorced woman who dreams of marrying the father, something is impossible. It shows that she is moving away from an important issue in her life and trying not to touch on it Again. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a woman getting married in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing a father getting married in a dream about a man and its meaningIf someone sees in a dream that he is preparing to marry his father and he is happy. He says that he will fail in an important matter in his life and this matter will bother him a lot. Also, the dreamer sees that he married his father in a dream and feels anxious and tense. This is an indication that he will enter into many new and big deals in the near future. And if a man is looking for a father in a dream, he marries him in a dream, but he cannot. It indicates that he will suffer a lot in his next life, and he will see some bad things. The dreamer also prepares for the wedding to marry his father in a dream. This is an explanation

title: Interpretation of buying a house in a dream - the meaning of buying a house in a dream

preview.html: The dream of buying a new house indicates entering into new projects and moving to a new and different life, and other interpretations we mention for single girls, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as buying a house. An old spacious house, buying a demolished house or buying a used or incomplete house, buying a house on the sea by Ibn Sirin and more in continuation of the topic. Interpretation of buying a new house in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying a new house or house, is approaching a new world full of goodness and joy, and whoever buys In his dream a luxurious house, he will have a blessed marriage. This indicates a prestigious job or job. Buying a new house in a dream is a sign of entering a new phase of life and can indicate years and years of earning, giving, display, and material or moral achievements. As for buying a new house in a student’s dream, it symbolizes success and excellence. In studying, it is also a symbol of success in exams, especially for those who wish to enroll in universities. Seeing yourself buying a house and moving into it in a dream indicates that due to success in the life of the person with the vision, he will rise to the highest ranks, make great profits and live a stable and happy life. Seeing in a dream Buying a house for the mother Buying a detached house with a garden indicates great success in both academic and professional life and that he will live in great comfort and happiness and realize visionary dreams. There will be no financial hardships or disappointments. And to live in a house where humility prevails, and for this reason he will not live in any misery or loss, and will live in stability, happiness, and health. I see in a dream that I buy a house from my grandfather. It indicates the dreamer’s desire for an ideal life. The person with vision is the one with determination and patience who does not give up on his dreams and goals and believes in achieving his dreams. And that he feels stable and that he will overcome the bad and sad days. Seeing someone buying a house in a dream shows that thanks to the support of the visionary’s relatives, he will achieve great success in the visionary’s practical life. Seeing yourself buying an old house in a dream indicates stinginess. The vision of buying a luxurious and expensive house in a dream shows the life of the visionary. Buying a white house in a dream indicates that the visionary will achieve his plan and thus fulfill his dreams and that the visionary will own a property and will achieve comfort and goodness. Buying a large house in a dream indicates the beginning of a new life and that the visionary will He forgets all the past and starts a new life. Moving to a new house in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a big dream for the dreamer. Due to the visionary's lack of self-confidence, he will not be able to achieve the desired success. Buying a house with a garden in a dream indicates the visionary achieving something unexpected. He will feel comfortable financially, and for this reason he will make a lot of profits. Seeing in a dream buying a house next to the mosque indicates acceptable, good and useful actions. And that the visionary person always does good deeds and cares about worshiping and obeying God. Seeing yourself buying a beautiful house in a dream indicates the happiness and success of the visionary person and that he always sees the cup as half full. He will live happily

title: Interpretation of a dream about mosques in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing mosques in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a mosque in a dream in general, in reference to the blessing and goodness that prevails over the dreamer, overcoming many problems, improving conditions, and triumphing over enemies. Also, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream appears The dreamer’s status in the afterlife. Interpretation of watching prayer in the mosque. For a single woman who dreams that she is praying in the mosque, this dream promises the fulfillment of her dreams and aspirations. And for a married woman who sees in a dream that she is praying in the mosque, this indicates the blessing and goodness that permeates the dreamer. A pregnant woman who dreams that she is praying In the mosque, this dream indicates the security and stability that prevails in her life and the safety of her pregnancy. And the man who sees in a dream that he is praying in a dream, this is a sign of abundant livelihood that will prevail over him. Interpretation of seeing building a mosque in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is building a mosque, this dream is a sign of a close marriage. For a single person or it can be a sign of fulfilling his dreams and surviving in his life, and if the dreamer is a merchant, then this dream is a sign of abundant profit and sadness. Interpretation of seeing the Grand Mosque in a dream. Scientists interpreted seeing the Sacred Mosque in a dream as a promise to perform Hajj for the dreamer. There are those who interpreted seeing the Grand Mosque in a dream as a reference to the jurist or the house of cod. Seeing a jellyfish in a mosque in a dream indicates a person. Nazih. Glass carpets in a dream indicate righteous people. Interpretation of seeing a mosque being demolished in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that demolishing a mosque, this is evidence of the failure of the marriage experience, or a failure in the field of knowledge, or the loss of the afterlife and the corruption of religion. It also indicates the abundance of sins and disobedience that the dreamer is carrying, which necessitates it. Return. To God and ask God for forgiveness. And whoever sees in a dream that he is sitting in the mosque, this dream indicates the abundance of goodness and livelihood that he enjoys. And the pregnant woman who sees her sitting in the mosque is good news for the safety of her newborn. God has a lot in the field of knowledge and religion. title: Interpretation of dreams about visiting the deceased Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the living visiting the dead: Very often, people come to us in a dream, whom we may or may not know. These people may be alive or dead. We may wonder what this dream means and what it means. Sometimes we see that we are going to visit a dead person, and when we wake up, we may panic as our time approaches, so we try to interpret this dream today. Different We will look at the meaning of the interpretation of the dream of the living visiting the dead and what are its interpretations for dream interpreters. What is the interpretation of the dream of the living visiting the dead: We may dream in many Sometimes visiting a dead person. In general, the meaning of this dream may be the dreamer’s desire to see that dead person and his longing for him. Read also: Dream interpretation of the symbol of a white mouse in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of visiting the dead for a single girl: Visiting an unmarried girl in a dream could be a sign of her engagement. Soon, especially if the deceased gave it to her as a gift. An unmarried girl’s visit to the dead may indicate her longing for him, so she visits him and recites Surah Al-Fatihah over him. But if an unmarried girl dreams of the dead and laughs with him, this indicates her success, even if she is a student, she will succeed. If an unmarried girl dreams that she If she visits the grave of her deceased father or mother and hears the sound of their crying, then they should pray. A living person visiting a dead person in a dream may indicate that he regrets not reminding him to pray, or it may indicate that he owes a debt and needs to pay it quickly. If a single girl sees a dead person, he does not want to see her. , he may do something bad that leaves him. Seeing the deceased in a dream smiling, and the girl intends to do something, then she must end this matter, but if she sees him angry, then she must leave this matter. Interpretation of a dream about visiting the dead for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself visiting a dead person, This is evidence of her honesty and loyalty to those around her. If a married woman sees that she is visiting her parents’ graves, this indicates that she feels lonely and misses them. If she sees that she is crying at her parents’ graves, this is evidence of the imminent death. If a married woman dreams that a dead person gives her something, this indicates Pregnancy is near, God willing. If a married woman dreams in a dream that the dead person takes something from her, this is evidence of limited livelihood, and God knows best. And whoever sees that he was visiting the dead person in a dream and living in a large house, this indicates his bliss in his grave and his good intentions. Interpretation of a dream about a visit The dead for a man: A man who sees himself visiting a dead person in a dream indicates that this person is religious and devout and that he is working for the future. If a man dreams that he is visiting a deceased person in his home, this means that he has obtained an inheritance. And whoever dreams that a dead person visits him in his home and gives him something, this means that he It indicates an abundance of sustenance. If the deceased gives the dreamer gold or silver, this indicates the marriage of one of the dreamer’s children. Seeing a dead person crying in a dream has many interpretations, such as that the deceased has a debt that must be paid, or that the deceased must be visited, the Qur’an read, and prayers. If he dreams If a man sees that the dead person is taking one of his family with him, this indicates his serious illness and may indicate the approaching death. Whoever sees that he went with the dead and then...

title: Secrets of interpreting seeing visitors in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Our article today is about the interpretation of visitors in a dream. Seeing visitors in a dream is considered one of the common dreams that people constantly dream about and constantly ask about through various interpretation sites on the Internet. But the interpreters differed regarding the meaning of the visitor in a dream. Some of them see that it has good connotations, while others see the opposite. That, so during our article today we will shed light on the interpretation of a visitor in a dream for different situations of one. And pregnant and married women in detail through the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of a visitor in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a visitor in a dream is evidence of people traveling or absent, and it has many connotations of kindness, contentment, and grace. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in his dream that he receives many guests in Ibn Sirin confirmed that the interpretation Seeing relatives in a dream varies depending on the condition of the visitor when he arrives, for example: If the guests of relatives in the dreamer’s dream wear the most beautiful clothes and have smiles on their faces, then the vision is a sign of the abundance of good, ample and good food that will come to the dreamer in the near future by order of a god.In If the guests in the dreamer’s dream wear dirty, intact or torn clothes, this is an indication that a lot of exhaustion, misery, misery, and many problems are on their way to the dreamer in the near future, God forbid, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. For more you can follow: -Interpretation of a dream about visitors from relativesInterpretation Seeing visitors in a dreamIn this paragraph, we discuss the interpretation of seeing visitors in a dream in detail below. Seeing visitors in a dream is one of the good dreams that herald the coming of goodness and comfort to the world. Seeing guests in a dream is interpreted as a sign that the dreamer has a good personality, so he realizes how to honor the guest. And his benevolence, and these qualities indicate that he is a good person. Seeing guests in a man’s dream interprets that he is successful in his work and life and is a sign that he will achieve what he seeks in this world in the coming days. The presence of guests in the dream indicates sustenance, as the dreamer may succeed in studying. Or work. Seeing visitors from neighbors means that there is a relationship and good relationship between the dreamer and those around him. Seeing visitors from parents means that the dreamer will receive support from his family. Interpretation of a dream for foreigners. Ibn Sirin believes that a strange visitor in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is patient with severe adversity, But God will ease his distress and grant him happiness and healing as a reward for his patience by God’s command, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Best.Interpretation of a dream about guests in the house for single womenIbn Sirin claims that seeing guests in general in the dream of a girl who is not yet married or has not married is a sign of kindness, abundance, and abundance that will come to her in the near future by God’s command. As for if the guest comes in the dream of an unmarried girl Without a problem

Evidence of a connection From a suitable person. Interpretation of seeing a man in a dream eating rotten bananas? Evidence of forbidden money. Interpretation of a dream about eating bananas by Ibn Sirin. Eating bananas in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explains, is often evidence of love and feelings between the dreamer and those around him, and in some visions an indicator of morals. The goodness that the dreamer enjoys in his life. Then, eating bananas in a dream indicates wealth, a lot of money, and a lot of sustenance. Then seeing bananas from the tree indicates happiness and psychological comfort that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing bananas for a single woman in a dream can be eating bananas in... Then eating bananas indicates the high position that the girl occupies at work. Dreaming of eating bananas can be an indication that the girl will achieve all Goals and ambitions that she desires. Next, if a girl dreams that she is offering bananas to guests, this is a sign of marriage soon. So, eating bananas in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of joy and kindness. So, green bananas in a dream are evidence of a connection with a suitable person For marriage. Interpretation of a dream about eating bananas for a married woman. Eating bananas in a dream for a married woman may indicate money and great sustenance. Then eating bananas is evidence of longevity and nutrition. After that, eating green bananas in a married woman’s dream is evidence of responsibility and high status. Bananas indicate in The dream indicates kindness and a lot of nutrition. Then bananas in a married woman’s dream indicate pregnancy in the near future. So, eating bananas is evidence that we will hear the good news soon. Seeing a dream about eating bananas for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams of eating bananas, this is a sign of having a baby Male. Then, in general, bananas in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate a lot of nourishment and affection. Then eating bananas indicates optimism and joy. Then eating bananas is an indication of easy delivery. Interpretation of a dream about eating bananas for a manIf one sees in a dream that he is eating a rotten banana, then this A sign of forbidden money. Then eating a banana indicates waste in a man’s dream. Then a rotten banana in a man’s dream means marrying a disreputable woman. After that, eating a damaged banana indicates unpleasant events that a man is going through. Joy in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about a bathroom

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream. It is one of the visions that many dreamers look forward to, because the dove is one of the most beautiful birds that symbolize peace and love, and we will try to get to know some interpretations. A married woman or a single girl for different scenes, such as seeing a dove flying or seeing a pigeon’s nest, but we always have to emphasize that it is necessary not to reject any interpretation of any vision, whether on our site or any other site in any dream, until it has been reviewed by one of the dream interpreters known for their effectiveness and medical science. Sharia law, so that the interpretation is not wrongly rejected in a way that might cause problems. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dove in a dream standing on the dreamer’s shoulder as meaning that the dreamer will receive a happy message soon - God willing. Also, a dove in a dream is considered by Ibn Sirin to be one of People who have money and many benefits that the dreamer will enjoy - God willing - soon. In addition to the fact that the colored pigeons in the dream are humane for the excellence and success that the present can achieve - God willing -. As for bathing with the dead in a dream, this may be a sign of... Failure or inability to achieve success, by God’s will. Seeing a pigeon in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a pigeon in her dream. This is considered a man for her. She is about to start an engagement project or a marriage project - God willing. Also, the unmarried girl who sees White pigeons in a dream, this may be one of the indicators that she will meet the next pigeon. As for seeing pigeon feathers in a dream, this indicates that an unmarried girl will break off her engagement in the coming days, God forbid. Seeing a pigeon in a dream for a married woman A married woman sees a pigeon in a dream This may be one of the signs that she will become pregnant soon - God willing. As for a married woman who sees in a dream slaughtering a white dove, this indicates that there is a problem with her husband’s family or with the husband. Also, the presence of a black dove in a married woman’s dream may indicate Exacerbating problems with the husband greatly. In addition to dreaming of black pigeon feathers, this indicates that the married woman is unfaithful. As for black pigeons in a dream in a cage, this indicates alienation and loneliness. Seeing pigeons in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman sees a dove in a dream, it is It is possible that this is a person who facilitates childbirth - God willing. Also, bathing in a pregnant woman’s dream could be evidence that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Also, seeing pigeon eggs or seeing baby pigeons in a pregnant woman’s dream may be a sign that she will give birth. Female, and God knows best. Seeing flying pigeons in a dream. If you dream of a pigeon flying in the sky, this may indicate that the dreamer enjoys superiority among men and a great and high position - God willing. Also, when seeing pigeons inside the dreamer’s house, this may be a sign that the dreamer He will move away from home in the future or travel to a far away place.
